name: Lucky Loan
text: Target 1 "Fortune Fairy" monster you control; Special Summon 1 Spellcaster monster from your hand or Deck, whose original Level is 1 lower than that monster's, also during your next turn after this card resolves, you cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters, except Spellcaster monsters. You can only activate 1 "Lucky Loan" per turn.
